original_title: You're Looking At Me Like I Live Here and I Don't
overview: In Danville, California, Lee Gorewitz wanders on a soul-searching odyssey through her Alzheimerâ€™s & Dementia care unit. Confined by the limits of her physical boundaries, she scavenges for reminders of her life in the outside world. Yet her search is for more than a word, or a memory, or a familiar face. It is a quest for understanding.
title: You're Looking At Me Like I Live Here and I Don't
